system_prompt: Translate the following English text into standard, grammatically correct Wolof. Use official orthography.
input: Innovations in agritech are helping farmers in the Casamance region optimize crop yields despite climate challenges.
output: Yokkute yi ci mbay mi ñoo ngi dimbali baykat yi ci goxu Kaasamaas ñu yokk seen meññeef doonte am na ay jafe-jafe ci jaww ji.

system_prompt: Translate the following English text into standard, grammatically correct Wolof. Use official orthography.
input: Artificial intelligence is transforming the world.
output: Xarala yu bees yi ñoo ngi soppi àdduna bi.

system_prompt: Translate the following English text into standard, grammatically correct Wolof. Use official orthography.
input: Senegal's digital 2025 strategy aims to position the country as a leading technology hub in West Africa.
output: Pexey Senegaal ngir xarala yu bees yi ci atum 2025 dafa bëgg a taxawal réew mi nekk njiitu xarala yu bees yi ci Afrig sowu jant bi.

system_prompt: Translate the following English text into standard, grammatically correct Wolof. Use official orthography.
input: The introduction of coding into the national curriculum is empowering students in Dakar with essential 21st-century skills.
output: Dugalug kode ci njang mi mooy may ndaw yi xam-xamu 21eelu xarnu bi.

system_prompt: Translate the following English text into standard, grammatically correct Wolof. Use official orthography.
input: Local startups are leveraging fintech solutions to improve financial inclusion for small business owners in the Sahel region.
output: Ay sosete yu dëkk bi ñoo ngi jëfandikoo ay pexey xarala yu bees yi ngir gën a baaxal jot ci xaalis ngir boroom liggéeyukaay yu ndaw yi ci réewum Saalum.

system_prompt: Translate the following English text into standard, grammatically correct Wolof. Use official orthography.
input: Recent ECOWAS summits have prioritized discussions on democratic stability and cross-border trade agreements.
output: Ndaje yu mujju yi ECOWAS jëm ci waxtaanu dëggu demokaraasi ak déggoo ci diggante réew yi ngir jaayante bi lañu doon waxtaane.

system_prompt: Translate the following English text into standard, grammatically correct Wolof. Use official orthography.
input: Renewable energy projects, particularly solar farms, are critical for sustainable development across the continent.
output: Projet yi ci wàllu doole yu bees yi, rawatina tooli naaj yi, dañu am solo lool ngir yokkute bu yàgg bi ci kontinaan bi.

system_prompt: Translate the following English text into standard, grammatically correct Wolof. Use official orthography.
input: Natural language processing enables computers to understand human language.
output: Xarala yu bees yi ñooy may ordinatër yi xam làkk wi nit ñi di wax.

system_prompt: Translate the following English text into standard, grammatically correct Wolof. Use official orthography.
input: The expansion of 4G coverage has significantly boosted mobile money adoption in rural Senegalese communities.
output: Yokkute bi ci ñeenti giléem yi yokk na lool jëfandikoo xaalisu telefon ci dëkk yu sori yi ci Senegaal.

system_prompt: Translate the following English text into standard, grammatically correct Wolof. Use official orthography.
input: Higher education reforms are currently being implemented to align university degrees with the demands of the local labor market.
output: Reformu njang mu gëna kawe mi ñoo ngi ko defar ngir mu méngook soxlay liggéeykat yi ci gox bi.

system_prompt: Translate the following English text into standard, grammatically correct Wolof. Use official orthography.
input: The new Bus Rapid Transit system in Dakar is designed to reduce traffic congestion and lower urban carbon emissions.
output: Sistemu bus bu gaaw bi ci Dakaar dafa ñu ko defar ngir wàññi jafe-jafey dem ak dikk yi te wàññi emisoŋ yu bonn yi ci jaww ji.

system_prompt: Translate the following English text into standard, grammatically correct Wolof. Use official orthography.
input: Promoting gender equality in STEM fields remains a top priority for educational policymakers in the region.
output: Yokk yemale ci diggante góor ak janq ci wàllu xarala yu bees yi ak xam-xam bi moo nekk lu ñuy jëfe bu baax ci kilifay njàng mi ci gox bi.

system_prompt: Translate the following English text into standard, grammatically correct Wolof. Use official orthography.
input: Deep learning is a subset of machine learning based on neural networks.
output: Jàngat bu xóot mooy benn wàll ci jàngat masin yi te mu ngi sukkandiku ci ay réseaux neuronal.
